strong: From code to vacation policies. All up-to-date. All in one place.
That time adds up to a lot of frustration,
p: How are you making sure your developers have time to learn and stretch and innovate? See how much time they’d have without unnecessary interruptions.
Over 100 million developers and technologists visit our public platform every month. Empower them to innovate with a tool they already know and love.
Empower every employee to contribute, learn, and nerd out in one place. So your most junior employee can share the knowledge of your most senior.

“Stack Overflow has a dedicated platform for collaborators to come together to solve nebulous problems in an asynchronous, documented way with multiple perspectives that evolve into a structured format that captures collective insights.”
Stack Overflow for Teams works with your existing tech stack to centralize knowledge that’s scattered, buried, and impossible to find.
Recruit the best developers and keep them by giving them the tool they already trust and use.
You need a modern approach to knowledge sharing. One that works if you’re hybrid, all-remote, or in-office. Make your workplace work for everyone, everywhere, all the time.
div: Number of developers and technologists at your company
h2: Total hours spent per day by people searching for solutions and answering questions
Preferred by developers and technologists around the world.
An award-winning tool to attract and retain award winning talent.
Build your organization’s knowledge for the future.
h3: Attract, onboard, and retain top talent.
